title: UI/UX Design
description: Crafting seamless user experiences with a keen eye for design.
I specialize in creating intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interfaces.
I focus on understanding user behavior to design applications that are functional and enjoyable.

title: Frontend Development
description: I bring designs to life with clean, efficient code.
As a front-end developer, I work with the latest technologies like React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS.
I build responsive and dynamic websites that ensure a smooth user experience across devices.

title: Prototyping & Wireframing
description: Before diving into development, I create wireframes and prototypes to visualize the final product.
This helps ensure clarity, saves time, and makes the design process collaborative and agile.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: I build websites that are not only beautiful but also adaptable.
Whether on a desktop or mobile device, I ensure the design looks great and functions perfectly.
Creating a seamless experience for all users.

title: Interactive Design
description: I specialize in creating interactive elements and animations that engage users and improve the overall experience.
From micro-interactions to immersive animations, I add that extra touch of creativity to make interfaces stand out.

title: Component-Based Development (React)
description: With expertise in React and component-based development, I build scalable, reusable UI components.
This approach ensures maintainability and flexibility for future updates.
Helping to keep the code clean and modular.
